reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: institute for Security studies - Operationalization of the African Union African Governance Architecture Project

description.narrative: In 2012 MFA signed a grant agreement with ISS to contribute to ISS comprehensive funding proposal for them to implement their 2012-2015 strategy. This proposal seeks to contribute towards improving good governance achieving stability peace and prosperity in Africa. The project is to provide a tailored support to the AU Africa governance platform to operationalize the implementation of its Africa Governance Architecture (AGA) in Africa. a MOU has been signed by both parties and ISS has also identified risks and mitigation strategies which can be associated with the implementation of this project . Beneficiaries will be Africa SCO and the unit AU unit staff
